definition: to harvest/to reap/to gather in crops
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: The Reapers' mines are definitely multi-purpose.
sentences.chinese: 收割者的雷肯定是多用途的。

sentences.english: They are reaping a field of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在收割一片麦田。

sentences.english: That's for mechanical harvesting-the grape growers'way of beating the unions.
sentences.chinese: 这是为了便于机械收割，是葡萄园主对付工会的办法。

sentences.english: This kind of fast, bloody raid is something the Reapers really excel at.
sentences.chinese: 这样的快速机动使得“收割者”非常擅长搜索。

sentences.english: This feign, the Eastern Zhou Dynasty is planted afresh certainly paddy, when reaping, you capture again they.
sentences.chinese: 这佯，东周一定重新种稻，收割时您再夺取它们。

sentences.english: 37Thus the saying 'One sows and another reaps' is true.
sentences.chinese: 俗语说‘那人撒种，这人收割’，这话可见是真的。

sentences.english: Shouguang Combine Bit Factory located at the Shandong Province Shouguang.
sentences.chinese: 寿光市联合收割机刀片厂位于山东省寿光市。

sentences.english: Both of Oscar's hind legs were accidentally chopped off in a combine harvester.
sentences.chinese: 奥斯卡的两只后腿不小心被一台联合收割机截断。

sentences.english: Fallow and recently harvested fields are lighter blue.
sentences.chinese: 未耕作土地及刚收割完毕的田地则呈现淡蓝色。

sentences.english: News Second, re-sold to harvester factory in Harbin.
sentences.chinese: 企业新闻二，本厂收割机再次销售到哈尔滨。

sentences.english: When the wheat is headed it is reaped and threshed .
sentences.chinese: 麦子熟了，就把它收割脱粒了。

sentences.english: Watch the field where the men are harvesting, and follow along after the girls.
sentences.chinese: 我的仆人在那块田收割，你就跟着他们去。

sentences.english: Moreover, it is an excellent hay, which can be cut twice.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，这总是一种可以收割两次的草料。

sentences.english: Afghan farmers harvest wheat outside Kabul, Afghanistan, Thursday, June 24, 2010. (AP Photo/Dusan Vranic)
sentences.chinese: 6月24日，阿富汗农民在喀布尔外收割小麦。

sentences.english: During a normal season, he would plant rice after harvesting the beans.
sentences.chinese: 放在平常季节，收割大豆后他就会开始种植稻米。

sentences.english: It facilitates more efficient planting, watering, weeding and harvesting.
sentences.chinese: 它有利于更有效的种植，灌溉，除草和收割。

definition: to crush or compact by means of a roller
person/number of people/(per) capita/(a person's) head/(Tw) person whose identity is used by sb else (e.g. to create a bogus account)
to revive/(lit. and fig.) to come back to life/(religion) resurrection
to chop/to cut down/to throw sth at sb
